name: Dystopy
description: DYSTOPY is a hybrid game mixing elements of a beat emâ€™ up action game and a platformer. The journey focuses around Sasha, a young mechanic and her robot R0-X4-N3.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4590 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R9 290 or NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
